name: MIURA 31
notes:
One of the most successful racer cruisers from South Africa during this period. Most came from this South African builder, but  some others have been built at various places around the world.
The deck shape evolved from the flush foredeck of the earlier models, to a more extended (forward) coach roof in later versions (shown here).
Interior layouts vary widely.
The ones built in South Africa are known for very solid construction.
